Santa_Monica.Los Angeles Open: The Genesis Open is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour in southern California, first played 92 years ago in 1926. Its previous names include Los Angeles Open, Northern Trust Open and Nissan Open. Played annually in February at the Riviera Country Club in Pacific Palisades, it is often the concluding event of the tour's "West Coast Swing" early in the calendar year, before the tour moves east to Florida.
